remarks: Distribute proper substitution through the Cartesian product of two classes.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 10-Nov-2012.)  Obsolete as of 23-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbrn instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: csbxpgOLD $p |- ( A e. D -> [_ A / x ]_ ( B X. C ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ B X. [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) $.
